meta.title: Operation of Magnetic Stirrer with Hot Plate

sections.purpose: To provide simultaneous heating and stirring of laboratory samples.
sections.scope: Applicable to analytical and synthetic tasks in Pharmaceutical Analysis.
procedure: Place the heat-resistant container on the center of the plate.
Insert a magnetic stir bar into the liquid.
Switch ON the stirring function and set to a moderate speed.
Switch ON the heating function and set to the required level.
Monitor the temperature using an external thermometer if needed.
Turn OFF both heat and stir functions after the task is complete.
Allow the plate to cool before removing the container.
Clean the surface and retrieve the stir bar.
precautions: Do not heat the unit above the flash point of the solvent.
Keep the electrical cord away from the hot surface.
Ensure the stir bar is not jumping or rattling.
Always wear PPE when handling hot or rotating liquids.
